name: The Unlife of Gorlak
summary: An RPG inspired by Princess Maker, Tokimeki Memorial, and TTRPGs. You play as Gorlak, a recently revived villainous dragon adjusting to his new unlife. Explore areas by spending a limited amount of energy per day to take your chance on various kinds of encounters. As you explore and train your non-combat skills, you build up your combat stats and gain special abilities.
